page.title: 03Householder Survey Results
page.content: These are the results of a random survey of 54 householders within this area. When asked whether they liked living in the area,the householders questioned were overwhelmingly positive about the area.Many remarked what a friendly place it was and appreciated the advantages of living in the country. Many also felt it was very convenient for getting to larger centres such as Oxford or Aylesbury. The only complaint voiced was that of householders living on the A418,who thought there was rather too much heavy,noisy traffic. When asked if they would like to live in a bigger town over 90% of those questioned did not want to.
